structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.history: Repealed 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 12.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Disposition of school districts upon consolidation.
